injuries.comment: Bogdanovic did not play in Wednesday's (Feb. 14) game against Orlando.

The Miami Heat announced Terry Rozier has a sprained right knee and he will be evaluated week-to-week, sources tell  @TheAthletic  @Stadium .
Dru Smith has been diagnosed with a 3rd degree right knee sprain. He will be out for the remainder of the season.
Hayward will not play until after the All-Star break, according to Head Coach Mark Daigneault.
The Chicago Bulls announced guard Zach LaVine will undergo surgery on right foot and be out the rest of the season. via @AdamSchefter on X.
The Bulls announced that Williams has been diagnosed with acute bone edema in his left foot and will be re-assessed in approximately two weeks.
Ball will miss the 2023-24 season while recovering from surgery.
